remarks: A matrix with dimension 1 is an ordered pair with an ordered pair (of the one and only pair of indices) as first component.  (Contributed by AV, 15-Aug-2019.)
statement:
mat1dim.a $e |- A = ( { E } Mat R ) $.
mat1dim.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
mat1dim.o $e |- O = <. E , E >. $.
mat1dimbas $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ E e. V /\ X e. B ) -> { <. O , X >. } e. ( Base ` A ) ) $.
